name: World Army Chess by SZY
description:
1 Introduction
World Army Chess is a four-player board game that simulates world army wars. It is a very popular game around the world, especially in China, where it is called Siguo-Junqi (四国军棋) and several generations have been spending their recreation time on it.


2 About World Army Chess Series.
World Army Chess series provides ten Game Modes.
1. 2 Players Mode (On same device)
2. 4 Players Mode (On same device)
3. Net 2 Players Mode (Local net and Bluetooth)
4. Net 4 Players Mode (Local net and Bluetooth)
5. Online 2 Players Mode (Game Center with Auto-match, Inviting-friends)
6. Online 4 Players Mode (Game Center with Auto-match, Inviting-friends)
7. Super Online 2 Players Mode (Asynchronous or Synchronous via Game Center)
8. Super Online 4 Players Mode (Asynchronous or Synchronous via Game Center)
9. Referee Mode
10. Player Mode

(Online Mode of 5 & 6 are specifically supported by Online version)
(Super Online Modes of 7 & 8 are specifically supported by Super Online version)


World Army Chess series provides six Game Types
1. Rank Visible Type,
2. Rank Blind Type
3. Mixed Type
4. Attack Visible Type
5. Half Blind Type
6. Mixed Visible Type

3 Features
1. It fully supports four languages: Chinese, English, Japanese and Traditional Chinese. The player can select his own language even his opponent chooses a different one.

(See in-App help file for rules.)

-----------------------------------------
(Chinese)
-----------------------------------------
◉游戏功能介绍
本四国军棋系列共有8个不同版本，10个游戏模式，6个游戏类型。
本版支持游戏模式：同机双人，同机四人，局网双人，局网四人，在线双人，在线四人，公证人，回放
本版支持游戏类型：明棋，暗棋，暗糊棋，碰明棋，半暗棋，明糊棋
本版支持棋子语言：中文，英语，日语，中文繁体

◉游戏模式说明
同机（双人/四人）模式：同机对战
局网（双人/四人）模式：局域网络或者蓝牙内对战
在线（双人/四人）模式：通过Game Center的速配和邀请朋友的方式同时在线对战模式
超级（双人/四人）在线：通过Game Center可同时在线也可不同时在线的对战模式
公证模式：充当公证人的功能
回放模式：回放历史游戏的功能

◉游戏类型说明
明棋：棋子大小互见
暗棋：棋子大只限己见
暗糊棋：随机布局的暗棋
后明棋：棋子大小在对战后互见
半暗棋：最后两排棋子的大小只限己见
明糊棋：随机布局的明棋

◉游戏规则
请参见游戏内帮助文件。
